Donation If you would like to support our efforts to keep 8chan's software updated, please consider donating to the development via cryptocurrency. Our official wallet addresses are below. To donate via some other method feel free to contact us at 8moeadmin@protonmail.com

The easiest way to buy crypto and donate is with Atomic Wallet. Its major software and its free. Just install and run it, choose "Buy Crypto" and purchase your donation amount worth of one of the three options below using a normal card or Paypal if applicable. Click the type that you're sending in the app once you receive it, choose "Send" and paste in our appropriate address for the crypto you chose. Bitcoin is the easiest.

Bitcoin: 1P1k9QcTMJ2qC4rNzy27v6J93vpWQYWHuK
Etherium: 0x87f7Be68863d95BA62d6408DE95506714d3Df5b0
Monero: 48oy9aA1Uv6em1sSA3yyCE4PN9knPSY3pj4SzkMgqQVcY6zDPwLQmng2K8GQGNKeQJC3nsKesK2RSZKQjeE6DgbMRDKDTzz
